name: View Cones and Telephones
description:
Do you have what it takes to tell people they don't have what it takes? Guide your squad of Operators through enemy defenses. You can lead these knuckleheads to their doom, but you can't make them drink the gain-pain. Corral your terrified troopers and reign in your berserking battle-bros. In View Cones and Telephones, the minds of your own soldiers will play just as much into your downfall as the heavy artillery of your opponents. So? You got what they don't... have tell people have... got takes do to... uh... 

Do ya?
